name: Tiempo Muerto (death time)
description:
PLAY THE GAME IN EDGE IF U CAN.

----------------------------------------- Lore --------------------------------------------

in this game you are fred, a little alien whose universe is destroyed, fred has only 5 seconds of life time, he has to be close to the spikes to recover his life time;

to save his universe he has to colect all the lights of olimpia, colect all the olimpia lights to save fred's universe

---------------------------share--------------------------------------

share your times in the coments if u save the universe

------------------------------------------- Controls ---------------------------------------

move with arrows and jump with C,

NOTE: to wall jump u need to stick to the wall and then press C

-------------------------------------------- Assets ------------------------------------------

- Sprites: kenney

- Sounds: Open Game Art

- Music : StereoPhysics

- Creation Tool: raylib

- Level Editor: Tiled

-physics: ferox

----------------------------------------------Made with love ( not love 2d lol ) for the raylib game jam: raylib 5K GameJam

----------------------------------------

F5 to start a new run
